title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Highly anticipated HBO series from 'Mare of Easttown' creator Brad Ingelsby, starring Mark Ruffalo, boasts an excellent 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes and a strong 77 Metacritic score.

title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: From 'Breaking Bad' creator Vince Gilligan, this Apple TV+ drama is critically acclaimed with an outstanding 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes and an 87 Metacritic score.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: This Netflix crime drama features A-list stars Jason Bateman and Jude Law, attracting significant attention with a 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35,000 votes.

title: Monster: The Ed Gein Story
overview: The shocking true-life tale of Ed Gein, the infamous murderer and grave robber who inspired many of Hollywood's most iconic on-screen killers.
reason: Part of Ryan Murphy's hugely popular 'Monster' anthology on Netflix, this series stars Charlie Hunnam and is expected to generate significant cultural buzz due to its notorious subject matter.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor â€” who might be a murderer.
reason: A Netflix mystery drama featuring acclaimed actors Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys, it holds a solid 7.5 IMDb rating from over 21,000 votes and a good 71 Metacritic score.
